title: The Ultimate Frank Lloyd Wright (PC)
creator_credit: Jeff Hixson, Byron Preiss and Microsoft Corporation
brief_description: A stimulating history of Wright’s influential architectural design which gives you insight to his genius as well as an understanding of the influence his architecture has had on subsequant generations of architects. This program allows you to design your own buildings and gain an understanding of the architectural process. SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS: Multimedia PC or comp- atible with a 486/33 microprocessor; 4 MB of RAM (8 MB recommended); 500 KB of avaialable hard-disk space; double speed CD-Rom drive; super VGA display; MS DOS operating system (version 3.1 or later); Microsoft Windows version 3.1 or later; MPC-compatible sound card; Microsoft mouse or compatible pointing device.
